author: akarasulu
msg: Ok the iit ldapbrowser works but there are apparent problems.  Marshalling
issues are predominantly at fault.  I will gradually fix them. We should
use more than one browser though to test the different ways they display
the DIT with various search requests.  Right now there is an attribute
by name request mashalling issue.  Attributes specified in the return list
will cause marshalling problems and that's why this ldapbrowser does not

author: akarasulu
msg: Fixed several points where normalization issues exist.  Right now two
different means are used to do the same thing: the parser is used directly
on the schema interface via getNameParser and normalize is used with the
Schema.DN_ATTR distinguished name attribute.  We need to make sure only one
means is used.  Also we need to find a way to cash names or need to change
interfaces to accept Names instead of Strings for distinguishedNames.  The
server currently is very inefficient parsing the same DN potentially

author: akarasulu
msg: Replacing old DN parser with new antlr parser.

author: akarasulu
msg: Just started cleaning up these classes.

author: akarasulu
msg: These jars are present in commons so we're removing them from the server.
